name: Ray Cothern
body:
![Headshot Image](./images/ray1.png)

## Who am I?
Good question! My name is Ray Cothern.

I'm a student studying Computer Science at UCLA, and an aspiring Game Developer. In my free time I'm an avid musician and theater lover, and of course a huge gamer.

## What projects have I done?
I've worked on several personal projects, demos and videos are available at: 
> [http://tinyurl.com/ray-cothern-portfolio](http://tinyurl.com/ray-cothern-portfolio)

* __743__  (Virtual Reality Game : Spring 2015)
  * Developed using Unreal Engine 4 and Oculus Rift, this game explored immersing the player in a test lab environment as a human guinea pig. Employed the AI behavior tree capabilities of Unreal Engine to create adaptive AI agents that challenged and learned from the player

* __The Wolf and the Man__  (Interactive Animation :  Winter 2015)
  * Utilizing the capabilities of Unity 4, this animation presented the characters and story of a Brothers Grimm fairy tale in a compelling and interactive adaptation

* __The Legend of Hanuman__  (Game : Spring 2011 - Winter 2012)
  * A 2D platforming game in Java using the LibGdx library. Notable features included an A* algorithmic pathfinding AI, as well as a basic level editor for creating additional content. 

## Resume
My resume is available here: 
> [https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Yzez0WuHyANSFPfN8qD3yppa9FuSAA8r0IWdlRQVBck/edit?usp=sharing](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Yzez0WuHyANSFPfN8qD3yppa9FuSAA8r0IWdlRQVBck/edit?usp=sharing)

## Contact Me
Feel free to shoot me an email at: rtcothern@gmail.com
